mapper.insert: insert into article( article_id, username, publish_time, follower_count, like_count, dislikecount, comment_count, article_topic, content, theme_name )values ( (select max(article_id)+1 from article), #{username}, now(), 0, 0, 0, 0, #{articleTopic}, #{content}, #{themeName} )
mapper.update: update article set follower_count=follower_count+1 where article_id=#{articleId}
update article set like_count=like_count+1 where article_id=#{articleId}
update article set dislike_count=dislike_count+1 where article_id=#{articleId}
